column3: “This is some of the best bud I've smoked in a long while. I knew after looking at the dense and gorgeous looking nugs that this was grade-A devil's lettuce, but was definitely not expecting it to bring me into rapture. The symptoms creep one by one: uplifted, euphoric, giggly respectively. I smoke weed every day and was getting tired of some of the not-so-potent bud I was inhaling, so Blue Dragon was extremely refres...”

“Blue Dragon is definitely one of my favorite strains out there. If you are anything like me and have a high tolerance, this is the perfect strain for you. It doesn't take much to get the effects to hit you. It is very smooth and satisfying to take a hit of no matter if it's a joint, blunt, bowl, or bong. The effects are long lasting and fantastic. Highly recommended for an everyday smoker.”

“Just tried it for the first time, literally as im writing this. The first two hits were very tasty, heavy berry and almost earthy flavors really stick with you. 
 I find it's a bit of a creeper, it kicked in a little at first, but around 5 minutes later all of my muscles relaxed, relieving some of my chronic back pain from an injury and scar tissue pain on my belly from my hysterectomy 8 months ago. This would have b...”

“Just smoked this strain, wish I would've bought more since my dispensary is now out.  This is a quick hitter, and the moment it hits you nothing but happiness.  These buds are not purple like the description states.  Left me feeling worry free and energetic for hours, my wife was surprised by how much house work I spontaneously did when she got home.”

“I have been smoking this for my last 3 purchases. Normally I'm the kind of guy who prefers variety to his meds, but with blue dragon, I don't even feel the need to. It's by far one of my favorite strains ever ! Long lasting, creative, euphoric, happy, awesome high. lasts for quite some time. I love this bud! GET SOME NOW!”

“I'm a pretty heavy smoker, I smoke on the daily and multiple times a day. This was some good stuff, the name attracted me because I like the color blue, I only bought a joint at the shop, then smoked it with my buddy, with just that one small joint we were both good for a while. This strain has me looking for it haven't been able to find it since but it's bomb! If you're a heavy smoker and need something that'll get ...”
“My favorite strain in almost 5 years!!! Blueberry & Sour Diesel?!? Grabbed from Green River Meds in Detroit Michigan 👍 With drivethru service. Definitely will becoming back.”

“Although not easy to find for me, blue dragon is one I stock up on when I do get a good supply.  It is rather potent, and at the same time you are able to function at a fairly high level. This is a good working bud.”

“Although not easy to find for me, blue dragon is one I stock up on when I do get a good supply.  It is rather potent, and at the same time you are able to function at a fairly high level. This is a good working bud.”

“Happy, giggly, awesome mood enhancer, with a nice little buzz that keeps you going. It's the perfect hybrid for wake and bake but....Blue Dragon packs a hell of a punch, lightweights should go easy.”
“Great stuff. Pretty hard hitting and makes music heavenly. Feels weird though, when you come down, the decline is sharp. From decent high to almost no high”

“I smashed some of this flower into rosin and it totally kicks my ass. I usually end up laughing at the dumbest shit for about a good half hour. After that, sleep can be achieved incredibly easy. Perfect last smoke of day.”
“nice heady buzz. energetic and euphoric.  comes on strong yet not too strong to trigger paranoia.”
“I get sooooo giggly on this strain. A joint is the perfect amount to do an activity like watch a movie or play a video game or socialize. This stuff is good even when it gets dry.”

“Was told it was a favorite, boyfriend loves it.
I couldn't get past the taste and smell after it was lit. I guess blueberry/berry taste isn't for me. I'll stick with the sour strains.

The high was great though, pretty heavy for the small amount I took in.”

“A very happy high, great for depression. After a single bowl in one night, I felt the effects of its stress revealing poweress. For two days my depression seemed cured, and I spent those days sober.

a much harsher than expected smoke, with a very subtle blueberry hint. It hits hard with an amazing head-rush which in turn creates a happy, talkative high.”
“Great cannabis for relaxing after a stressful or hard day. Great flavor.”
“really prominent taste, with a very strong odor, enjoy smoking joints of this bud over using a pipe, beautiful buds, crystals, and trichomes over the top.”
“I get sooooo giggly on this strain. A joint is the perfect amount to do an activity like watch a movie or play a video game or socialize. This stuff is good even when it gets dry.”
“nice heady buzz. energetic and euphoric.  comes on strong yet not too strong to trigger paranoia.”

“Was told it was a favorite, boyfriend loves it.
I couldn't get past the taste and smell after it was lit. I guess blueberry/berry taste isn't for me. I'll stick with the sour strains.

The high was great though, pretty heavy for the small amount I took in.”

“Tight buds with lots of dark red hairs and clear trichomes. Grinds up to be nice and fluffy and vaporizes evenly. TONS of vapor flood my wand, filling my mouth and nose with intense berry taste and smell. My body quickly relaxes and my pain vanishes in minutes. This is definitely a new favorite.”

“Always been a sour diesel and Jack Herrera lover.. But must say that the blue dragon was such a great all inclusive smoke that I purchased more the following day just to stock up and enjoy this beautiful new strain for myself”

“I smashed some of this flower into rosin and it totally kicks my ass. I usually end up laughing at the dumbest shit for about a good half hour. After that, sleep can be achieved incredibly easy. Perfect last smoke of day.”

“Always been a sour diesel and Jack Herrera lover.. But must say that the blue dragon was such a great all inclusive smoke that I purchased more the following day just to stock up and enjoy this beautiful new strain for myself”

“Very smooth smoke; instant body relaxation with calming cerebral effects; full, fruity taste like cherry tobacco; great for depression, anxiety, migraines; some energy; this one's for relaxing nights out with nothing complicated.”
“Good for a day at home, good luck socializing!”

“Not only is the Blue Dragon tasty, it's quite potent as well.

I've been enjoying this uplifted, motivated feeling during the daytime for a week now.  I can be faded as all get out and still handle social settings smoothly.  I'd definitely give this a go if you get the chance.”
“it has a strong euphoric and sedative effect. taking a hit is like breathing in the spring breeze. the purple in it is very delicious I recommend this to everyone”
“This strain was very potent and got me a nice high. It was dense, but when grinded turned almost soft from all the THC crystals.”

“I was so tired and unable to just relax and have a good night's sleep, due to muscle cramps and pain. Blue dragon with it's fruitty undertones made me drift into blue clouds and dream a little dream. I finally got some good" sleep and woke up refreshed. Yey for Blue Dragon!”"

“I thought this would be good for leg cramping, but didn't think it worked much at all in this regard.  I also noticed I got headaches from it.  Kind of a bummer.  It does last a while in a sort of comfortable daze. It wasn't as energetic as I had hoped.”

“I feel as if my vision is much brighter and feel euphoric and ready for tasks.  Even though I'm about to start my weekend.  Pretty amazing in my view everything from flavor to the classic sour diesel feeling with added indica spaciness.”

“Not only is the Blue Dragon tasty, it's quite potent as well.

I've been enjoying this uplifted, motivated feeling during the daytime for a week now.  I can be faded as all get out and still handle social settings smoothly.  I'd definitely give this a go if you get the chance.”
“Really yummy, grapey flavor with nice sativa effect.”
“it has a strong euphoric and sedative effect. taking a hit is like breathing in the spring breeze. the purple in it is very delicious I recommend this to everyone”

“I was so tired and unable to just relax and have a good night's sleep, due to muscle cramps and pain. Blue dragon with it's fruitty undertones made me drift into blue clouds and dream a little dream. I finally got some good" sleep and woke up refreshed. Yey for Blue Dragon!”"

“Blue Dragon to me is an example of a nearly perfect hybrid. On one inhale I'm instantaneously flooded with warm memories, and comfortable body high, yet that's juxtaposed with an uplifting cerebral presence. Filled with so much energy,I'm ecstatic and by the end of a bowl I'm positively beaming.”

“I had 2 different experiences with Blue Dragon. The first time it made me extremely tired and pretty much put me on my as when some friends and I were fishing. My bell on my pole rang meaning I had a fish on and as I got up to reel it in I said to my friends I'm too stoned." Yeah. The second time I wanted to do all kinds of stuff. Like I was down for whatever. I guess it really intensifies whatever mood you're alrea...”"

“Bought this in a vape cartridge and it put me into this mellow laid back feel. Music was explosive. Smoked it before drumming and it put me in this tunnel focus. I was able to concentrate on different instruments every clearly. didnt really give me a creative boost but it helped for the quality of music being played. I recommend this to musician's for a more focus approach to music.”

“I was so tired and unable to just relax and have a good night's sleep, due to muscle cramps and pain. Blue dragon with it's fruitty undertones made me drift into blue clouds and dream a little dream. I finally got some good" sleep and woke up refreshed. Yey for Blue Dragon!”"
“Really yummy, grapey flavor with nice sativa effect.”

“Blue Dragon to me is an example of a nearly perfect hybrid. On one inhale I'm instantaneously flooded with warm memories, and comfortable body high, yet that's juxtaposed with an uplifting cerebral presence. Filled with so much energy,I'm ecstatic and by the end of a bowl I'm positively beaming.”

“I had 2 different experiences with Blue Dragon. The first time it made me extremely tired and pretty much put me on my as when some friends and I were fishing. My bell on my pole rang meaning I had a fish on and as I got up to reel it in I said to my friends I'm too stoned." Yeah. The second time I wanted to do all kinds of stuff. Like I was down for whatever. I guess it really intensifies whatever mood you're alrea...”"
“Fantastic strain. Almost perfectly balanced hybrid.   Very happy, uplifted high with a little ting lines that floats into pleasant relaxation. If you find this, you need to try it.”

“Bought this in a vape cartridge and it put me into this mellow laid back feel. Music was explosive. Smoked it before drumming and it put me in this tunnel focus. I was able to concentrate on different instruments every clearly. didnt really give me a creative boost but it helped for the quality of music being played. I recommend this to musician's for a more focus approach to music.”

“Definitely as described by others if you're a smoker with a high tolerance this is definitely a strain to try out if you can find it. The effects slowly set in one by one just leaving you all around happy and euphoric.”

“Such a good hybrid. Perfect for a wake and wake session. I felt giggly, uplifted and energized. Perfect for anxiety and depression. It also helps with migraine and aches. Id take Blue Dragon over Blue Dream. Simply because Blue dragon is a well balanced sativa dominate hybrid. Blue dream is too much for me, it worsened my anxiety. But yeah I totally recommend Blue Dragon.”
“it has a strong euphoric and sedative effect. taking a hit is like breathing in the spring breeze. the purple in it is very delicious I recommend this to everyone”

“Not really a novice weed with a strong, steady animated high that comes on pretty fast. The immediate effect coupled with a tasty terpene profile that promotes continued use can cause anyone to go overboard!! Very yummy all around. The euphoric head buzz left me creative and busy with a continued focus on each task until complete. This last part being a small miracle considering my lack of focus albeit great for my a...”
“Great stuff. Good mellow high. Gets you very high.”
“Sweet berry flavored Earthy strain. Relaxed feelings without painful stabbing. This strain takes away the pain associated with arthritis, joint pain, neuropathy. Tastes sour Diesel and berry.”
“Love Blue Dragon for it's TALKATIVE and LONG-LASTING effects.”
“Very intense head high which transitions into an even flow of mind and body high!  Doesn't last as long as Girl Scout Cookie but defiantly does the job!”
“Liked it alot!”
“Delish. Instant blueberry flavor making love to your mouth followed by that beautiful Sour Diesel high.”
“Delish. Instant blueberry flavor making love to your mouth followed by that beautiful Sour Diesel high.”
“Super 2 hitter, fresh buds, berry and sweet taste with a fuel hint smell . Excellent good for afternoon and evening use, highly recommended.”
“Great for social anxiety”
“Sweet berry flavored Earthy strain. Relaxed feelings without painful stabbing. This strain takes away the pain associated with arthritis, joint pain, neuropathy. Tastes sour Diesel and berry.”

“Wow.... A little bit will do you! Was not expecting to hammered like that! Definitely need to be ready to relax and sit a bit! Great for the nausea and pain too. Tried mine in a preroll and it's perfect!”
“It's an awesome strain. If you vape it the flavor is kind of mint tasting and it makes u very active and happy. It is the best strain I've ever vaped/smoked.”
“Very good”
“One of my favorite strains, gives you a heavy body high and very relaxed 💆😪😴”
“Very good”
“One of my favorite strains, gives you a heavy body high and very relaxed 💆😪😴”

“Very solid. No body understands the meaning of average anymore. This strain is very average which is great. I wish I could rate 1-10 because this is a solid 7. People don't appreciate how wonderful average is. You don't always have to have the number one strain to be satisfied. This strain is solid and will always give you a guaranteed fun time. If you have any doubts about blue dragon then just go for it. I promise ...”

“Just woke up from smoking a J of this strain, it has more of a heavier feel to me. It was easy for me to knock out, so this wouldnt be the strain id recommend if your sensitive to inidica type or looking to be more social on.”
“It really WORKS! if you wanna sit and look at a movies or chill with friends (Who smoke) and have a great time!!!”
“This has become my regular end-of-the-day
column5: kick-back-and-relax" strain. Taste the blueberry and the acrid fuel
column6: feel all the stress and tension of the day melt away. Despite its potency and pungent aroma
column7: delivers a surprisingly smooth smoke. A+”"

column3: “very potent strain that helps with pain while also keeping things fun”
“i only tried a little but i liked it”

“Mellow and chill.
I recomiend it to anyone really.”
“Good smooth flavor with excellent physical relaxation very quickly.”
“wow. this stuff is great. powerful indica effect”

“Eating this flower and allowing it to dissolve under your tongue primarily gave me a floaty, relaxed , challenging to focus medicated feeling in about 3 minutes after eating it, At the 4 hours after consumption mark, a more focused, heady and analytical feeling comes about , at which time my neck pain creeps back in and an slight internal headspin begins.”
“Well, not every strain can be a hit, unfortunately. I'm always suspecting of staff recommendations, I take it as Hey we need to get rid of this strain
column4: let's recommend it to the clients".

column2: I find this didn't do much for me. I'm a moderate smoker
column3: usually every several times a week and even then  I only smoke 1/3 of a small joint
column4: so tolerance isn't the issue. I wish I could write a more in-dept review

column3: “I got so high very strong even stronger flavor”
“My favorite, so chill and gives an uplifting mood. I use this when i do my homework. Keeps me active and overall really soothing for my comfort.”

“Never heard of this beauty,ive been recuperating from oral surgery and been smoking on Grape Cookies to help me sleep and relax. This hybrid is Amazing , the Blueberry relaxes and envelops u in a warm euphoric blanket but then the Sour part stimulates ur brain to be social, happy, and present. Warning!! The more u smoke the heavier the Indica efffects kick in. 
Great for a group session tho. Have munchies ready.”
“I got so high very strong even stronger flavor”
“very nice smoke and amazing high. as soon as I opened the bag all I smelled was blueberry, very potent. would recommend to anyone!”

“This strain taught me the difference between sativa and sativa-dominant hybrids. Also made no doubt that my chronic pain responds to sativas, not indicas. The body high is concentrated around behind my eyes and like a stone in my stomach (but my stomach is quiet, no upset stomach here). Good strain, but the Sour Diesel component doesn't do much for me, I guess (or should I try Sour Diesel directly?)”
“My favorite, so chill and gives an uplifting mood. I use this when i do my homework. Keeps me active and overall really soothing for my comfort.”

“Never heard of this beauty,ive been recuperating from oral surgery and been smoking on Grape Cookies to help me sleep and relax. This hybrid is Amazing , the Blueberry relaxes and envelops u in a warm euphoric blanket but then the Sour part stimulates ur brain to be social, happy, and present. Warning!! The more u smoke the heavier the Indica efffects kick in. 
Great for a group session tho. Have munchies ready.”
“this smoke hits me great for the nerve pain and is a great bidy high”

“This bud just made it into my top 5! This strain is something I could get used to smoking, the euphoric and uplifting effect was beautiful. The way the high creeps up is insane hit me like a brick wall! Hardly had to smoke much to be completely faded out of my mind 😂!! Definitly recommend this strain 9/10”
“this is a great value strain when you want more bang for your buck”
“nice even hybrid”

“The specimen I picked up was gorgeous , so dense cured perfectly ! So was a 5g. I love blueberry so naturally I was drawn to it, it tastes like a sour blueberry , i don't think I will find another drop of this plant and quality ever again... My precious.”
“One of my all time favorites.  Very pretty buds and sweet smell.  The taste is superb, all sweet berry with a marvelous aftertaste.  Super good high, you feel it all over.  Happy  and pain free.”
“Really love this. It is the perfect balanced hybrid! Feeling relaxed and happy with zero couch lock. Good stuff.❤️”
“by far the best hybrid I've smoked. it takes all life's problems away”
“Oh man I love this strain, it tastes wonderful, and is a great night cap, gets me straight to bed.”
“awesome bud, excellent early am smoke. breaks down great, rolls and burns nicely. recommended if you'd like a creative boost/inspiration. worries melt away, no anxiety could be in public fine”

“Definitely cracked my top 10 with this. It'll stick you wherever you're at but as soon as you get moving you wanna stay moving. Great hybrid, subtle onset but powerful effects. Tingling sensations paired with heavy relaxation and buzzing makes for a great high!”
“The absolute BEST everyone should try it”
“Delish. Instant blueberry flavor making love to your mouth followed by that beautiful Sour Diesel high.”
“Love Blue Dragon for it's TALKATIVE and LONG-LASTING effects.”
“Wonderful body and mind high!! Felt great to be able to function without so much pain!!”
“very potent strain that helps with pain while also keeping things fun”
“Pretty tasty, yet different... I don't know I liked it, it definitely crept up on me.”

“The best high CBD strain I have tried.  I got some Blue Dragon Desert Frost CO2 cartridge from Electric Lettuce recently.  It kicked my depression, anxiety, and PMDD (PMS on steroids) in the arse.  

I can have several vape sessions throughout the day and continue to have a clear head so I can work and function w/o it affecting my abilities.  You get an amazing body high from this strain!  Hard to beat that feeling. ...”
“Well, not every strain can be a hit, unfortunately. I'm always suspecting of staff recommendations, I take it as Hey we need to get rid of this strain
column4: let's recommend it to the clients".

column2: I find this didn't do much for me. I'm a moderate smoker
column3: usually every several times a week and even then  I only smoke 1/3 of a small joint
column4: so tolerance isn't the issue. I wish I could write a more in-dept review

People don't appreciate how wonderful average is. You don't always have to have the number one strain to be satisfied. This strain is solid and will always give you a guaranteed fun time. If you have any doubts about blue dragon then just go for it. I promise ...”
“Great stuff. Good mellow high. Gets you very high.”
“Sweet berry flavored Earthy strain. Relaxed feelings without painful stabbing. This strain takes away the pain associated with arthritis, joint pain, neuropathy. Tastes sour Diesel and berry.”

“Got some through Green Gold Farms that tested at over 29%. It’s amazing. Blueberry notes with a bitter undertone that hints of orange and diesel. 

I rolled a joint and it took me an hour to burn.”
“First time to try this and so so so glad I did. great mind/body buzz and 100% party n/depression helper. great surge of focus/awareness with big burst of creativity. Highly recommend this strain!”

“This bud just made it into my top 5! This strain is something I could get used to smoking, the euphoric and uplifting effect was beautiful. The way the high creeps up is insane hit me like a brick wall! Hardly had to smoke much to be completely faded out of my mind 😂!! Definitly recommend this strain 9/10”

column6: feel all the stress and tension of the day melt away. Despite its potency and pungent aroma
column7: delivers a surprisingly smooth smoke. A+”"

column3: “One of my favorite strains, gives you a heavy body high and very relaxed 💆😪😴”
“Liked it alot!”
“growing some and it smells strong in veg. stage. strong growth i recommend”
“AMAZING!!”
“pretty strong. sativa effects first, then indo. nice relaxing productive high”
“It is an Amazing strain I prefer to smoke it in a Honey Berry Wood, taste is on point, feel the High pretty good, the smell is Ok...but Im a O.G Brat”
“Awesome energy!  Makes you have mad munchies! Awesome for pain from  pms and great for nausea!”

“Never heard of this beauty,ive been recuperating from oral surgery and been smoking on Grape Cookies to help me sleep and relax. This hybrid is Amazing , the Blueberry relaxes and envelops u in a warm euphoric blanket but then the Sour part stimulates ur brain to be social, happy, and present. Warning!! The more u smoke the heavier the Indica efffects kick in. 
Great for a group session tho. Have munchies ready.”
“I got so high very strong even stronger flavor”

“Eating this flower and allowing it to dissolve under your tongue primarily gave me a floaty, relaxed , challenging to focus medicated feeling in about 3 minutes after eating it, At the 4 hours after consumption mark, a more focused, heady and analytical feeling comes about , at which time my neck pain creeps back in and an slight internal headspin begins.”
“wow. this stuff is great. powerful indica effect”
“Good smooth flavor with excellent physical relaxation very quickly.”

“Mellow and chill.
I recomiend it to anyone really.”
“It really WORKS! if you wanna sit and look at a movies or chill with friends (Who smoke) and have a great time!!!”

“Just woke up from smoking a J of this strain, it has more of a heavier feel to me. It was easy for me to knock out, so this wouldnt be the strain id recommend if your sensitive to inidica type or looking to be more social on.”
“Very good”

“Wow.... A little bit will do you! Was not expecting to hammered like that! Definitely need to be ready to relax and sit a bit! Great for the nausea and pain too. Tried mine in a preroll and it's perfect!”
“Great for social anxiety”
“Super 2 hitter, fresh buds, berry and sweet taste with a fuel hint smell . Excellent good for afternoon and evening use, highly recommended.”
“Very intense head high which transitions into an even flow of mind and body high!  Doesn't last as long as Girl Scout Cookie but defiantly does the job!”

“This right here!!! Boy! It's that gas ... every time I'm in town I grab a q of this and the classic OG Kush. Blue dragon has a Fruity taste and Berry like aroma 🔥.... My girl loves it and I love when she smokes it cuz she'll be ready to eat or get eaten, this for sure is some rapper weed... so be careful how you smoke this.”

“Wow, I just picked this up from Stumptown, and what caught my eye, was were the pale yellow hairs that just pop out in contrast to the frosty, light green bud. And these nugs were dense and fluffy. The aroma has that blueberry smell we all love, but those diesel, earthy notes. The flavor is just...holy shit this stuff tastes good! Sour blueberry, but an earthy, refreshing exhale.”
“It's an awesome strain. If you vape it the flavor is kind of mint tasting and it makes u very active and happy. It is the best strain I've ever vaped/smoked.”
“very kiefy and fruity smelling the blueberry genetics are prominent. good hybrid more on sativa side makes good rosin fairly good yields on presses 4/5 -Budtrist”
“One of the best strains I ever smoked. Got some tail of this strain lol”
“This was just average, it did the job but, nothing really stood out for me.”

“I got this strain the last time I went in to the dispensary.  It tested high and looked great.  However when I got it home and actually touched it, it was incredibly dry.  It burnt fast and was really harsh.  I was not impressed by this batch.  I may try again in the future.”
“The bus is looking good...like the smell...i will post something when im done”
“Very good strain. I'm a light weight but I think it will get everybody high. Nice body buzz. Good meditation partner”

“This is absolutely one of the best high I've had in one time. My new favourite (replacing Black Tuna;BTU) it has such a strong pungent stank and rivals some of the best Indicas I've had. New smokers, stay away! Lol! 

Blue Dragon is Fire, Forever blazing,

Ace”
“This is a very nice bud. Super tasty and so calming. I was pleasantly surprised. Probably the best I've had in a while.”

“this is one of my absolute favorite strains!  the taste is wonderfully fruity and light.  A very heady sativa that gives me a bit of energy and is a great pick me up after work.  It is worth a try, for sure!”
“i might buy it again, if it were one of the only hybrid strains available. pleasant smoke in a blunt. i like it.”
“i only tried a little but i liked it”
“Great strain but really puts you down for the count. It's a really tasty strain and is an overall good experience”
“Very pretty buds, hint of berry in the smell is fantastic, smokes smoothly and will definitely help keep a conversation going! Amazing high. I picked up an 8th, I would recommend you do the same!”
“Near perfect 50/50 hybrid - you will know it if you see it!”

“If I could give Blue Dragon 6 stars I would. The bud I purchased has 27% THC and almost 1.5% CBD. The effects are perfection!! This is in my top 3 of favourite strains. It has a pronounced body buzz, providing good pain relief and an absolutely beautiful cerebral euphoric high, making you forget about your pain, lol 😄😄. You feel light, tingly and happy, happy, HAPPY 😊!!!! No anxious feeling, paranoia or burn out w...”
“Very beautiful deep blue-purple bud with rich orange hairs. Excellent fruity but deep and earthy taste with a smooth release. One of my very favorite buds.”

“Blue Dragon is a beautiful hybrid, rich in flavor & dense in weight. Previous reviews are spot on when they mention the blue berry notes, one of my favorite aspects to this strain. Smoke this anytime of day - Bdr is a great body relaxant without making you sleepy. Taste great, feels great & is easy to love.”
“Tasty full of Kief and Stoney AF. Love it”
“This strain is one of my favorites. It tastes great and packs a punch.”
“Favorite strain of all time. The head feeling is immense but controlled and the body side is wonderful as well.”
“very nice chill & mellow high”
“just got some today and just tried it. must say. very phenomenal strain a must try”
“Great high. I didn't really taste the flavor of it much but it was such a smooth hit. The high is really nice, relaxing and mellow. Chill head high.”
“A nice slow creep for the onset and then it just rolls over you like a wave. Very body high and tingly. Everything just felt good. Took away any remaining anxiety at the end of the day.”

“I really like this strain. It gets me going in the mornings. Very strong smell, pretty green nug with lots of orange mixed in. Anything bred with sour diesal is going to get a good review with me. Blue dragon is a ok with me”
“You don't cough a lot, easy smooth blueberry take down. You make the best faces.”
“The high's alright, but it tastes like hay!”
“I loved this strain. Started in the morning and had an energetic and euphoric feel all day long!!!”
“Dreamy relaxing cbd feel. Strong cerebral high slightly sedating with upper body buzz. Good for beach or nature walks”
“The most uplifting strain I've had. Felt super motivated and active all afternoon.”
“The most upliftinf weed I've ever had, felt super motivated and energetic all day.”
“Knockout strain. Recommended for PM use.”

“This is one of my favorite highs of all time! The first time I smoked it I spent three hours melted to my bed with a magical whooshey body high that felt like a roller coaster. The flavor was super complex with berry, citrus and subtle diesel tones. I'm a huge fan, very hard to find here in WA.”

“Not purple like a expected, but definitely had that fruity smell, in fact I couldn't stop smelling it! Lovely dense buds. Made me feel very happy and itching to do something. If you put your self to it it is a very functional high, but if you have nothing to do, it can make your mind TOO active. Not good for beddytime.”
“Totally worth it tasted amazing looked beautiful and smelt heavenly”
“Great daytime medicine!”
“Yes”
“Yeah this is definitely one of the most intense highs i've gotten from an indica strain. Like a previous comment said: New smokers
“Out of curiosity I tried this strain and was pleasantly surprised! The taste was nice but subtle. But the high was soaring and blissful! And a decent couch lock to go with it! This is a must try!”

“One of the best CBD heavy strains I've ever tried. Almost immediately after smoking a bowl i found my headache subsiding, my upset stomach calming down and my cramps gone. Perfect strain for that time of the month!”
“I love this strain. Very pungent with a strong berry aroma. Awesome look, and very dense, potent nugs. 4.7”

“An amazing hybrid. I felt both the head and body high, and it's such an uplifting and pleasant high. Got the munchies really badly, as well as super bad dry mouth, but if you satisfy both you're good to go.”
“its a bit of a creeper and you might need to smoke a little bit more to feel it but when the effects start to settle in, the are very strong”

“I really enjoyed this Hybrid! It has a sweet smell and a nice light flavor! I'm a fan! 

It's not too strong of a indica or sativa it's the perfect blend. You can smoke it anytime day or night!”
“I am really high right now...”
